message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000. I believe this reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I would like to propose a price of $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,600,000.
